Classes/HBApplication/Configuration.html.abstract: Disables the Nagle algorithm for send coalescing.

Classes/HBApplication/Configuration.html.abstract: Pipelining ensures that only one http request is processed at one time

Classes/HBRequest.html.name: HBRequest

Classes/HBMiddlewareGroup.html.name: HBMiddlewareGroup
